Class Customer

  • java.lang.Object
    • lab2.Customer

  • public class Customer
extends java.lang.Object
    encapsulates the details of registered customers of the XYZ shop who buy Items

      • buyItem

        public void buyItem(Item item)
             throws java.io.IOException
        Displays details of the item bought and the current balance, if the customer has sufficient balance and the quantity specified by the user is greater than or equal to one. If the customer donÅft have the sufficient balance, this method displays the message ÅgInsufficient balanceÅh .If the quantity specified by the user is less than one, this method displays the message ÅgOrder is not validÅh.
        Parameters:
        item - item:Item chosen by customer
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
